DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate vivo kinematics TKA perform two different prosthesis : kinematic retaining ( Physica KR ) posterior-stabilized ( Physica PS ) design mean fluoroscopic analysis activity daily live ( rise chair , stairs climb , leg extension ) . In comparison asymptomatic knee . Patterns femoral rollback analyze assess motor-task dependent correlate clinical outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Fluoroscopic Analysis Total Knee Replacement With Kinematic Retaining Posterior Stabilized Design
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients submit Total knee arthroplasty ( TKA ) Physica KR PS ; 2 . Patients appropriate initial fixation stability knee prosthesis ; 3 . Patients achieve minimum flexion 100° Knee Society Score ( KSS ) ≥ 65 ( fair/good postoperative outcome ) 6month followup ; 4 . Patients affect primary secondary Osteoarthritis ( OA ) surgery ; 5 . Patients understand requirement study willing able comply activity require fluoroscopic examination ; 6 . Patients sign Ethics Committee approve studyspecific Informed Consent Form . 1 . Patients misalignment axial malrotation knee prosthesis ; 2 . Patients able achieve minimum flexion 100° KSS Knee Score ≤ 65 point 6month followup ; 3 . Patients plan surgery uninvolved knee within year ; 4 . Muscular insufficiency absence muscololigamentous support structure require adequate soft tissue balance ; 5 . Patients significant neurological musculoskeletal disorder disease may adversely affect gait compromise functional recovery evaluation ; 6 . Patients neuromuscular neurosensory deficit would limit ability assess performance device ; 7 . Any psychiatric illness would prevent comprehension detail nature study ; 8 . Participation experimental drug/device study within 6 month prior screen visit 9 . Female patient pregnant , nursing , plan pregnancy due xrays exposition .
